title: 怎么使用Trident标签来识别三叉戟
author: 理智反迷你

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
理智反迷你 发表于 2020-2-26 15:18
你这三叉戟怎么做的
你帖子上复制的

replies.author: (=°ω°)丿
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 隐退 于 2020-2-26 14:53 编辑 
execute at @e[type="minecraft:trident",nbt={inGround:1b,Trident:{tag:{Tags:["tnt_1"]}}}] run复制代码

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content: execute at @e[type=minecraft:trident,nbt={inGround:1b},tag=tnt_1] run say 1

replies.author: CR_019
replies.txt_content: 把生成命令里的Item改成Tridentsummon minecraft:item ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"[{\"text\":\"爆炸三叉戟\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"bold\":false,\"italic\":false,\"underlined\":false,\"strikethrough\":false,\"obfuscated\":false}]",Tags:["tnt_2"],CustomNameVisible:1b,Item:{id:"minecraft:trident",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:"[{\"text\":\"爆炸三叉戟\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"bold\":true,\"italic\":false,\"underlined\":false,\"strikethrough\":false,\"obfuscated\":false}]",Lore:["{\"text\":\"所到之处，寸草不生。\",\"bold\":false,\"italic\":true,\"underlined\":false,\"strikethrough\":false,\"obfuscated\":false}"]},Tags:["tnt_1"],HideFlags:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:3},{id:"minecraft:loyalty",lvl:3}]}}}
